heading.category: General (Click on the pie chart to see the patients included in the pie chart)
heading.name: Patient Status (Seen/Billed)
heading.definition: Number of active patients in the practice seen within last 3 years and number not seen in last 3 years.

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT SUM(fin.THREE) AS "Number Active, Seen/Billed within 3 years", SUM(fin.NOT_SEEN_THREE) AS "Number Active, Not seen/billed within 3 years" FROM ( SELECT IF( DATE_SUB(CURDATE() , INTERVAL 3 YEAR) <= DATE( MAX(cmn.observation_date) ) OR DATE_SUB(CURDATE() , INTERVAL 3 YEAR) <= DATE( MAX(bm.service_date) ) ,1 ,0 ) AS THREE, IF( DATE_SUB(CURDATE() , INTERVAL 3 YEAR) <= DATE( MAX(cmn.observation_date) ) OR DATE_SUB(CURDATE() , INTERVAL 3 YEAR) <= DATE( MAX(bm.service_date) ) ,0 ,1 ) AS NOT_SEEN_THREE FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN casemgmt_note cmn ON ( d.demographic_no = cmn.demographic_no AND cmn.signed = 1 AND cmn.provider_no != '-1' ) LEFT JOIN billingmaster bm ON ( d.demographic_no = bm.demographic_no AND bm.dx_code1 != ${billingCodeExcluded} ) WHERE d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING count(d.demographic_no) > -1 ) fin;

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT d.*, d.patient_status AS pt_status, max(cmn.observation_date) as last_encounter, max(bm.service_date) as last_billing FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN casemgmt_note cmn ON ( d.demographic_no = cmn.demographic_no AND cmn.signed = 1 AND cmn.provider_no != '-1' ) LEFT JOIN billingmaster bm ON ( d.demographic_no = bm.demographic_no AND bm.dx_code1 != ${billingCodeExcluded} ) WHERE d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING count(d.demographic_no) > -1 ORDER BY MAX(cmn.observation_date) ASC, MAX(bm.service_date) ASC, d.demographic_no ASC
